title: Client randomly closing since this patch
body: This happens during champ selects too and Ive lost a lovely amount of lp for it.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is experiencing a full disconnect from the game platform, which would cause it to close entirely. This is generally a result of your connection to the servers becoming unstable due to either local network settings or ISP routing issues. I recommend checking out our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if this helped resolve your issue.
